headline: Welcome to Crypto Week
keywords: Crypto Week, Security, IPFS, HTTPS, Tor, DNS, Reliability, Cryptography
description: The Internet is an amazing invention. We marvel at how it connects people, connects ideas, and makes the world smaller. But the Internet isnâ€™t perfect. It was put together piecemeal through publicly funded research, private investment, and organic growth that has left us with an imperfect tapestry.
